abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway sold a block of listed shares in PetroChina for the fifth time in three months, dropping its stake in the company’s share capital to 6.97 percent, according to a filing to the Hong Kong stock exchange Monday.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway sold a block of listed shares in PetroChina for the fifth time in three months, dropping its stake in the company’s share capital to 6.97 percent, according to a filing to the Hong Kong stock exchange Monday.
